channel.title: Comments on: Inside The Arena At Medieval Times

item.title: By: ericspaceman
item.dc:creator: ericspaceman
item.description: Well I appreciate that metric thats the way I like it :). When people can qualify an experience with a cost.
item.content:encoded: Well I appreciate that metric thats the way I like it :). When people can qualify an experience with a cost.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: It's worth it when it's 50% off. I dunno if it is really worth the regular price.
item.content:encoded: It’s worth it when it’s 50% off. I dunno if it is really worth the regular price.

item.title: By: ericspaceman
item.dc:creator: ericspaceman
item.description: looks fun, I wanna go but need someone to go with.
item.content:encoded: looks fun, I wanna go but need someone to go with.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: You guys should totally go. It's loads of fun.
item.content:encoded: You guys should totally go. It’s loads of fun.

item.title: By: Paulo
item.dc:creator: Paulo
item.description: I'd love to try that sometime. Have you seen this, BTW: <a href="http://www.slate.com/id/2107363/" rel="nofollow">How medieval-themed restaurants get it wrong</a>
item.content:encoded:
